H0.text: What type of creature is a bufflehead. Duck

H1.text: What type of creature is a bufflehead. Fish

H2.text: What type of creature is a bufflehead. Insect

H3.text: What type of creature is a bufflehead. Eend

A4.text: The bufflehead (Bucephala albeola) is a small sea duck of the genus Bucephala, the goldeneyes.

A5.text: Buffleheads are monogamous ducks. They nest in cavities in trees, primarily aspens or poplars, using mostly old flicker nests, close (usually < 25 m (82 ft)) to water.
